task.title: DFST Container Quick Start
task.shortdesc: If you are familiar with Docker you can follow these instructions to get going as quickly as possible.

li.p: On Windows and OS X you must have the Docker Toolbox installed and running. See the Docker documentation for details on how to run Docker. All Docker commands are run from the Docker command window or through the Docker Kitematic user interface.

info.p: See the GitLab Docker documentation: http://doc.gitlab.com/omnibus/docker/ for details.

step.stepresult: Docker should download and install the container. You should see messages like this when it's done:Status: Downloaded newer image for gitlab/gitlab-ce:latest Eliots-MBP:dfst-docker ekimber$
